name: Eat the Future
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #12

theme: Chain | Destruction | Harvest

You are sent to a remote island where you must grow food and exploit natural resources for your boss. Will you follow his orders, and bring the island's ecosystem to the brink of collapse, or disobey and create your own future. 

playthroughs last 2 - 15 mins,

3 different endings

Instructions:

Controls:

move - WASD

use - left-click

change item - scroll

interact/jump - SPACE

pause - ESC
